**** ************** ****** * **** **** ******** she did not even hear me out properly, seemed judgemental and just outright irritated. **** ******* *** * ********* given the state of her clinic and her behaviour, *** ******* ****** ** ******** Her assistant kept interrupting the consultation, **** ******* ******** *********** Nobody should visit this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ** **** *** ** *** ******* My wife went into labour before 33 weeks of gestation and that too in wee hours of the night. Dr Varsha not only rushed to the clinic (as she lives within the same apartment complex), she ensured both the twins were delivered safely. During pregnancy, she used to patiently answer all queries my wife had, either in person or through WhatsApp. In fact, my wife and I had covid when she was in second trimester. Doctor Varsha has saved my wife, our twins. She is really great.
reply_text: Dear Prana thank you for the heartwarming comments. Some patients are ideal. They believe in their doctors and God helps us to achieve the best for them üôè

review: I went to consult for my pregnancy. Doctor was very friendly in nature and explained very wellbut I went in very much urgency as I had little bit bleeding in night so I was worried whether I am pregnant or not. I already missed my period and did UPT which came negative. So I went to clinic to confirm pregnancy. I gave blood sample also for beta HCG test. but next day when I got reports from clinic they did not do my pregnancy confirm test. I was shocked and they told me to wait if period comes then we will do otherwise not.
reply_text:
I am sorry there seems to be some misunderstanding.
Please call me to solve your problem.
